member.name: IMFTimer.CancelTimer
member.summary: Cancels a timer that was set using the method.
member.param: Pointer to the IUnknown interface that was returned in the ppunkKey parameter of the method.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFTimer.SetTimer
member.summary: Sets a timer that invokes a callback at the specified time.
member.param: Bitwise OR of zero or more flags from the enumeration.
The time at which the timer should fire, in units of the clock's frequency. The time is either absolute or relative to the current time, depending on the value of dwFlags.
Pointer to the interface of a callback object. The caller must implement this interface. The callback's method is called at the time specified in the llClockTime parameter.

Pointer to the IUnknown interface of a state object, defined by the caller. This parameter can be NULL. You can use this object to hold state information. The object is returned to the caller when the callback is invoked.
Receives a pointer to the IUnknown interface of a cancellation object. The caller must release the interface. To cancel the timer, pass this pointer to the method. This parameter can be NULL.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The method succeeded, but the clock is stopped.

member.name: IMFTimer
member.summary: Provides a timer that invokes a callback at a specified time.
